Security Stays

We install security stays/restrictors to limit opening for child safety and ground‑floor security while keeping airflow across Wellington, Porirua, Lower Hutt, Upper Hutt, Petone and Kāpiti.

Where we work

Wellington, Porirua, Lower Hutt, Upper Hutt, Petone and Kāpiti.

Security stay FAQs

  • Do you fit restrictors for rentals and child safety?
    Yes. We fit restrictors/security stays that limit opening for child safety and ground-floor security while keeping ventilation.
  • Do you match finishes?
    We match finishes to your aluminium joinery and can adjust/replace later if needed.

FAQs

Can we still ventilate with security stays?

Yes — restrictors allow a safe opening while limiting window travel. Great for child safety and ground‑floor security.

Are they removable later?

They can be adjusted or replaced, and we match finishes to your aluminium joinery.
